trans-unit.target: 患者，分享您的感谢与使您的生活有所不同的医生。医生，分享您的患者的感谢信。

trans-unit.source: This simple act goes a long way toward improving your mood and the mood of those around you, reducing stress and spreading happiness in a fantastic and contagious way. This is why we’ve made sure to incorporate this positive energy into what we build for you.
trans-unit.target: 这一个微小的动作将会愉悦您以及您周围人的心情，减轻压力并且以一个极棒的方式散播这份愉悦。这就是为什么我们十分确定地要将这份正能量融合进我们现在正在为您做的。

trans-unit.source: by Ron Gutman brings together even more unique findings from his deep research of the science and history of smiling, with anecdotes from his outreach to social media and his travels around the world. The book reveals the astonishing benefits that smiling can produce for you and for others, and includes tips for how to bring more smiles into your life and to the lives of others.
trans-unit.target: Ron Gutman将他对微笑地科学历史的深入研究的结果和延伸的社会媒体和他环游世界的旅行中的奇闻异事联接在一起。这本书讲述了微笑可以为您和别人产生的令人震惊的优势并且也包含了怎么为自己和他人的生活带来更多的微笑的秘诀。

trans-unit.source: and respected bloggers have been saying about
trans-unit.target: 和受人尊敬的医生们一直在谈论我们

trans-unit.source: Michael is HealthTap's Chief Privacy Officer, General Counsel, and Business Development Director. He is responsible for HealthTap's privacy and legal policies, the company’s legal affairs, and for HealthTap’s business development. For over a dozen years, Michael has provided legal counsel and services to innovative technology companies, from early-stage startups to Fortune 100 companies. Prior to joining HealthTap, Michael served as an attorney with national law firms in Silicon Valley, as general counsel to high technology companies, and as pro-bono counsel to Singularity University. Additionally, Michael has served as a Judge Pro Tem in Santa Clara County, and as a judicial clerk in the Washington D.C. Court of Appeals. At Yale Law School, Michael was an editor of the
trans-unit.target: Michael是HealthTap的首席隐私保密官、总顾问、业务发展总监。他负责HealthTap的隐私和法律政策、公司的法律事务以及公司的商业发展。十多年了，Michael提供法律顾问和服务来创新驱动科技公司，这些公司包括刚刚创业的公司到一百强公司。在加入HealthTap之前，Michael是硅谷国家事务律师所的律师，是高科技公司的总顾问，也是奇点大学公益法律顾问。除此之外，Michael曾在在圣克拉拉县担任当地的法官一职，也曾在华盛顿上诉法院担任司法书记。在耶鲁法学院，Michael是的编辑

trans-unit.source: Useful health tips + beautiful images, delivered daily. Choose from 100 helpful topics.
trans-unit.target: 有帮助的健康小贴士+美丽的图像，每日推送。从100个有帮助的主题中选择
自定义您的患者应用程序

trans-unit.source: If you can improve a description on HealthTap simply select "Edit description" and make your changes. These will take effect immediately, and you'll be identified as the most recent editor to the Topic description.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想改进HealthTap上的描述，只需选择“编辑描述”并进行更改。这些将立即生效，您将被标识为主题描述的最新编辑人。

trans-unit.source: After you Thank an Expert, you'll have an opportunity to add a Thank You Note. Thank You Notes show added appreciation, and experts can post these notes to their Virtual Practices. (Please do not include any questions or information in these notes, and only send what you agree can be publicly shared).
trans-unit.target: 在您感谢专家后，您将获得添加一封感谢信的机会。感谢信表达了感激并且专家们可以通过在线手法将这些信展示出来。（请不要再这封信中出现任何个人问题或信息，请只写您同意能够被公开发表分享的）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s now gives you instant access to the latest peer-reviewed medical research, together with insights about it and comments on it from the medical experts on HealthTap. Have a question about a published study? We’ve got you covered – you can send a public question to our network, or even ask the doctor of your choice a question about the research via a Private Conversation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap现在使您能够及时访问到最新医学研究的同行评议和关于它的简介以及HealthTap医学专家对此的评论。对已发表的研究有一个问题？我们将全方面的为您提供帮助——您可以向我们的网络发送公开的问题，您甚至可以在HealthTap通过私人对话直接问您选择的医生有关调查研究的问题。

trans-unit.source: Want clarification? Ask a question about the article to our community of experts, or even enter into a Private Conversation about it with the doctor you choose.
trans-unit.target: 想要解释？您可以向我们的专家团队咨询一些有关这篇文章的问题，您也可以选择一名医生进行单独的会话。

trans-unit.source: Want to know what other doctors think of the research? Read the comments posted by medical experts, and learn what they have to say.
trans-unit.target: 想知道什么其他医生认为可以研究？读医学专家发表的评论，并理解他们说了什么。

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more? Quickly find other related publications on HealthTap, including similar research or articles by the same authors.
trans-unit.target: 想了解更多吗？迅速在HealthTap上找到其他相关出版物，包括同一作者类似的研究或文章。

trans-unit.source: by doing what you do best
Download HealthTap Express for Medical Experts on iPhone, Android, and iPad
trans-unit.target: 在iPhone,安卓和iPad上下载为医学专家的HealthTap Express

trans-unit.source: Highlight your published studies, add a user-friendly description of the findings, and even answer user questions about it (including Private Conversation requests). You can also add comments to any other published study on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示您发表过的研究，添加易于理解的关于研究发现的描述，甚至还回答用户问题（包括私人对话请求）。您还可以向HealthTap上的任何其他已发布研究添加注释。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s new Publications feature expands the reach of your expertise. Studies in peer-reviewed publications are now highlighted on HealthTap, directly from your Virtual Practice. Your research will be highlighted to Members looking for related health information on HealthTap, and you can even add to the description of your work. Have comments on an existing study? We’ve got you covered – add comments to the publications and even answer public questions or engage in private conversations with members about any study listed on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新出版物功能拓展了您的专业知识的范围。发表在同行评审出版物的研究现在突出显示在HealthTap上，直接在您的在线咨询上可以看到。您的研究将突出显示给在HealthTap上寻找相关健康信息的会员，甚至您可以添加到您的工作描述中。对现有研究有评论吗？我们已经覆盖所有操作 - 向出版物添加评论，甚至回答公众问题，或与会员进行关于HealthTap上列出的任何研究的私人谈话。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to answer this private message, just click the Answer button. If you don't wish to or aren't able to respond within 72 hours, you can instead click the "Sorry, I cannot help you" button below. Responding in a timely fashion will improve your Responsiveness and your DocScore.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要回答这条私人信息，只需点击回答按钮如果在72小时内您不想回复或无法回复，可以点击下面的“对不起，我无法帮助您”按钮。及时回复会提高您的反应灵敏和您的DocScore。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s unique offering for students is
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为学生提供独一无二的

trans-unit.source: informed on current events in medicine
Connect with your doctor from anywhere

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Scholars are a highly select group of leading doctors, and include the most engaged, respected, and helpful experts on HealthTap. trans-unit.source: "We love the power that HealthTap unleashes to doctors and patients – and we wanted the reproduce that functionality for our community. So rather than re-inventing the wheel, we plugged our users directly into their service, and are unlocking the power of doctor-patient interaction right within our own web portal. Integration took us a fraction of the time it would have taken us to develop an inferior solution from scratch."

trans-unit.source: At Waikato District Health Board ("Waikato DHB"), your privacy is important to us. This document gives you details about SmartHealth and how your information will be used and kept secure.
trans-unit.target: 在Waikato区健康委员会（“Waikato DHB”），您的隐私对我们很重要。这份文档将告诉您有关SmartHealth的详细信息，以及您的信息将会被如何使用以及保密。

trans-unit.source: A "Consult" within SmartHealth system will allow you to have either a video (using a computer, a video camera and a microphone) consultation or a typed / text consultation with a Waikato DHB clinician. During the consultation, the Waikato DHB clinician will update information about the consultation (e.g. information they provided you during the consultation such as diagnosis or treatment). This information will be stored in SmartHealth system and also sent to update your clinical record maintained at Waikato DHB and the Primary Health Organisation (e.g. your GP) that you are registered with, just as if they saw you in person.
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth系统内的 “咨询” 选项将允许您有一个视频咨询（使用电脑，摄像机和麦克风）或与Waikato DHB临床医生进行打字/文字咨询。在咨询过程中，Waikato DHB临床医生将更新相关咨询的信息（例如他们在咨询期间提供给您的信息，如诊断或治疗）。这份信息将存储在SmartHealth系统中，并发送以更新您在Waikato DHB和初级卫生组织（例如您的GP）保存的临床记录，就像他们亲自面对面为您看病一样。

trans-unit.source: On a private, safe and highly secured computer storage system in the United States of America (called a "Cloud"). This system meets the information security standards of the United States of America and New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: 在美国，一个私人的，安全和高度安全的计算机存储系统（称为“云”）。这个系统符合美国和新西兰的信息安全标准。

trans-unit.source: Where HealthTap content or services (including these Terms of Use) are translated into languages other than English, all such translations are for the convenience of our users only, and HealthTap is not responsible or liable in the event of any inaccuracy in such translation. In the event of a conflict between the English-language version of these Terms of Service, or any other content on HealthTap, and a version that has been translated into another language, the English-language version shall control and apply. You understand that content, including but not limited to questions and answers, may not have the same meaning in translation, and that treatments (including but not limited to medication names) and other information may differ from country to country and in different languages and may not be available in all places. Additionally, you understand and agree that virtual consultations with doctors may not be available in languages other than English, and you agree not to conduct a consultation with a doctor in a language in which you are not proficient without the use of a professional translator. If you are connected to a doctor who speaks your language, you understand that the doctor may not be a native speaker and that the doctor's ability to communicate may be limited. If you choose to use a translator in connection with a virtual consult, you understand that HealthTap is not liable for any errors or omissions in translation.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap部分内容或服务（包括此使用条款）被翻译成英语以外的语言，所有此类翻译仅为方便用户，HealthTap不承担任何翻译不准确所造成的责任。如果本服务条款的英文版本或HealthTap上的任何其他内容与已翻译成其他语言的版本发生冲突，应按照和采用英文版本。您理解，HealthTap上的内容（包括但不限于问题和答案部分）在翻译中可能不具有相同的含义，并且治疗（包括但不限于药物名称）和其他信息可能会因国家和国家/地区的不同、或语言的不同而产生差异，并且可能不适用于所有地方。此外，您理解并同意，与医生的在线咨询可能不提供英语以外的语言，并且您同意不使用您不熟练的语言与不使用专业翻译的医生进行咨询。如果您与使用您的语言的医生联系，您理解医生可能不是母语，医生的沟通能力可能受此限制。如果您选择使用翻译进行在线咨询，则您理解HealthTap不对翻译中的任何错误或遗漏负责。

trans-unit.source: Standard virtual consults: In these consults, doctors who have accepted you as a patient (whether for “on call” care, unless you already have an ongoing care relationship with the doctor) can provide care. You may receive an examination (within the limits of virtual care), provide a medical history, obtain an assessment from a physician, and receive a treatment plan as determined to be medically appropriate by the consulting doctor.
trans-unit.target: 标准在线咨询：在这些咨询中，接受您作为患者的医生（无论是否为“在职”护理，除非您已经与医生有持续的护理关系）可以提供护理。您可以接受检查（在在线护理的限制内），提供病史，获得医生的评估，并接受咨询医生觉得在医学上合适的治疗计划。

trans-unit.source: Introductory Consult: this is the first interaction with a new doctor or a doctor who has not yet accepted you as a patient on HealthTap. An introductory consult is not intended for the doctor to give you care. Introductory consults are for providing you with information or get to know the doctor and to determine if she or he can help you with your health concern (in person and/or through virtual consults). A doctor may need to invite you to her or his office for an in person appointment in order to accept you as a patient on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 介绍性咨询：这是第一次在HealthTap上与一个新医生或尚未接受您作为患者的医生互动。介绍性咨询的目的不是为了医生给您提供照顾。介绍性咨询是为您提供信息或了解医生，并确定她或他是否可以帮助您解决您的健康问题（亲自和/或通过在线咨询）。医生可能会邀请您到她或他的办公室进行个人预约，以接受您作为HealthTap上的患者。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is intended to give you easy access to health information (and even care) on your computer or mobile device. As a HealthTap patient (with a HealthTap Prime membership or other access to consulting doctors on HealthTap), you are entitled to receive medically necessary and appropriate care, and you agree not to abuse or overuse the access to doctors provided to you. Overuse includes requests for multiple opinions on single medical condition HealthTap consults should not be used : to obtain numerous opinions on a single medical condition. In general, doctors may discourage this practice and may be hesitant to provide an assessment to those patients who attempt to seek multiple consults. In cases where there is an absolute medical necessity, it may be appropriate to do more than one consult in a day about a specific health issue, but you may also need to consider seeking in-person care or emergency services if the level of severity truly is at the point where multiple consults are warranted (especially if in-person care is recommended by a consulting doctor on HealthTap).
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在让您轻松访问您计算机或移动设备上的健康信息（甚至护理）。作为HealthTap患者（具有HealthTap Prime或其他访问HealthTap上的咨询医生的资格），您有权获得必要和适当的医疗护理，您同意不会滥用或过度使用医生的访问权。过度使用包括对单一医疗状况的多个意见的请求。HealthTap咨询不会被用于：在单个医疗状况下获得许多意见。一般来说，医生可能不鼓励这种做法，可能会犹豫向那些试图寻求多方咨询的患者提供评估。在有绝对医疗必要性的情况下，在一天内就一个特定的健康问题进行多次咨询是可行的，但如果严重程度的真实性是多方咨询所担保的，您可能需要考虑寻求面对面的护理或紧急服务（特别是如果面对面护理是HealthTap咨询医生推荐的）。

trans-unit.source: If you signed up for a free trial or limited-period discount HealthTap Prime account, and allow the trial or discount period to expire, your account will automatically convert to a standard paid subscription account (starting your full-price subscription period and recurring charges). For the first month of your full-price paid subscription only, you have a 72-hour grace period to notify HealthTap Support in writing if you do not want to continue the subscription and/or to request a refund of your first month’s full-price subscription fee. This grace-period does not apply if you have engaged in one or more consults after the free-trial period. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and your subscription will be valid through the then current pre-paid month. HealthTap does not offer partial-month refunds.
trans-unit.target: 如果您注册了一个免费试用或时段限制的折扣HealthTap Prime账户，并允许试验或折扣期到期，您的帐户将自动转换为一个标准的付费订购帐户(开始您的全价购买订购期和经常性费用)。只对于您全价购买支付的第一个月的订购，如果您不愿意继续订购和/或要求退款全价购买订购您的第一个月的费用，您有一个72小时的宽限期来书面通知HealthTap支持。在免费试用期之后，如果您有参与一个或更多的咨询，那么这个宽限期将不适用。您可以在任何时候取消您的订购,然后您的订购将通过目前预付费生效。HealthTap不提供分批月份退款。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime offers primary-care consults from specific physicians on HealthTap only. Consults for specialist care are not available on HealthTap Prime. HealthTap Prime consults are available under an “on call” model where you will be connected with the first-available HealthTap Prime physician. If you wish to or do select a specific doctor (including specialists) to consult, these consults are part of the HealthTap Concierge service, are not included in your HealthTap Prime subscription, and are subject to additional per-consult fees. HealthTap Prime may not cover the cost of consults that originated from searching for a specific doctor or specialty. Pricing for any Concierge consults will be shown prior to initiating such consults and by participating in such a consult you agree to pay the fees associated with such a consult.

trans-unit.source: RateRx is a living work. As an open and ongoing feature on the HealthTap platform, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing can contribute to this data at any time. RateRx data reflect the ongoing feedback and ratings provided by doctors based on their real-world use of medications in treating patients, serving as a unique, continuously updated resource for the efficacy of both existing and new treatments.

trans-unit.source: Personally Identifiable Information is information that identifies specifically who you are. This includes information like your full name and your email address. We keep this information private by not displaying it or sharing it unless you agree. We keep this information secure, using state of the art encryption among other security measures. More information about our security can be found on our
trans-unit.target: 个人身份信息是指可以确认您身份的信息。我们保证此信息的隐私。除非您同意，否则将不会被显示或共享。

trans-unit.target: 本隐私声明中说明了非个人身份信息的信息示例，以及我们如何使用该信息。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows members to “connect with” doctors. HealthTap does not reveal your real name or any other Personally Identifiable Information to doctors when you Follow or Connect with them. If you request a Private Conversation with an expert on HealthTap, and an expert accepts this request, your name and Health Activity will be visible to that expert.
trans-unit.target: 在您与医生联系沟通的过程中HealthTap不会向他们泄露您的真实姓名或其他个人可识别信息。如果您在HealthTap上请求与一位专家进行对话并获得许可，您的姓名与健康活动将对该名专家可见。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.) For a small fee, you can also ask a specific HealthTap Medical Expert a question by starting a private health conversation [Conversation].
trans-unit.target: 对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者。（HealthTap的医疗专家不是您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者，他们对于问题的答案也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）您可以通过支付一笔较小的费用来与一名具体的HealthTap的医疗专家进行私下对话式的提问。

trans-unit.source: If you include Personally Identifiable Information in any publicly visible submission to HealthTap, this information may be used in ways that you or HealthTap cannot control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在上传到HealthTap的任何可见内容中加入了个人身份可识别信息，这些信息可能会被用于您或HealthTap不可控制的途径。

trans-unit.source: For a small fee, you can ask a question to a specific Medical Expert on HealthTap. The doctor has a limited period of time to respond. These questions are private (not visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors) and secure. trans-unit.target: 您可以通过支付一笔很小的费用来向HealthTap上一名具体的医疗专家提问。这些问题是隐私（对HealthTap上其他会员和医生不可见）且安全的。接受您询问的问题的医生将会有权看到您的健康活动信息和您的真实姓名。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Unlike publicly visible questions and answers on HealthTap, you can provide Personally Identifiable Information in an Episode question and follow up.

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve it. Information in Private Conversations cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。

trans-unit.source: The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use and disclosure. For example, information transferred to HealthTap is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. More information about our security measures is located on our
trans-unit.target: 我们的安全措施由专家设计并使用一系列科技和程序来保护您的个人信息不受未经授权的获得、使用或公开。我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap除非在您允许的情况下，否则不会和他人分享您的个人可识别信息（比如您的真实姓名或邮箱地址）。当您付费与HealthTap上一名医生开始私人健康对话时视为您允许使您的个人身份可识别信息对其可见。HealthTap的运营理念是帮助您找到可靠的私人健康信息。作为服务的一部分，HealthTap会给您提供您可能感兴趣或对您有益的外部服务商（比如健康诊所）。HealthTap在没有您明确的同意下不会向这些外部服务商提供任何关于您的个人身份可识别信息。服务提供商不能通过HealthTap获得您健康活动或其他的健康信息。

trans-unit.source: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues. The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat. The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses. Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.

trans-unit.source: With the next generation of HealthTap, Ron is working to change the lives of billions of people by providing them with instant access to doctors, together with easy ways to manage their health and wellbeing. By doing this, Ron is fulfilling HealthTap’s ultimate vision of helping people everywhere live healthier, longer, and happier lives.
trans-unit.target: 随着HealthTap的下一代，Ron正在努力改变数十亿人的生活，为他们提供即时访问医生，以及管理他们的健康的简单方法。通过这样做，Ron正在实现HealthTap的最终愿景：帮助世界各地的人们生活的更健康、更长寿、更快乐。

trans-unit.source: has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

trans-unit.source: The CDC and the United States Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) recommend that Baby Boomers (those born 1945–1965) and high-risk individuals get a simple blood test to screen for Hepatitis C Virus (HCV). trans-unit.source: No. HealthTap is not an ACA-compliant line of coverage, but rather an ancillary solution to bridge your clients' deductible gaps. It is the perfect wrap for a CDHP skinny plan, and is proven to streamline claims utilization both in the group fully-insured space and the group self-insured space. In fact, we typically drive healthcare savings of over $50 per employee per month for these organizations.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不是符合ACA标准的覆盖范围，而是一种辅助解决方案，以弥补客户的可扣除差额。它是CDHP瘦身计划的完美包装，并且被证明可以在组保险空间和组自保险空间中简化索赔利用。实际上，我们为这些机构的员工每人每月省下了至少50美金健康医护费用，这是我们的特点之一。

trans-unit.target: 预购分销：根据此协议，执业执照人同意以基准价格预先购买至少基本数量的合格的产品订购。本次付款应授予执业执照人以下权利：(I) 以任何价格出售这些预购订购，执业执照人应从HealthTap收到HealthTap为这些预购订购收集的所有订购协议费用。

trans-unit.source: “Annual Subscription” means a Subscription for a one year period starting on or before the end of the Calendar Year.
trans-unit.target: “订购一年”的意思是，订购期为一年，从一年的年末或在年末之前开始。

trans-unit.source: “Base Price” means the fee identified in Exhibit A. LICENSEE EXPRESSLY UNDERSTANDS AND AGREES THAT BASE PRICING CONSTITUTES CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION UNDER THIS AGREEMENT AND AGREES THAT DISCLOSING THIS INFORMATION, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, CONSTITUTES A MATERIAL BREACH OF THIS AGREEMENT.
trans-unit.target: “基准价格”的意思是在Exhibit A中被认为的费用。根据此协议，持证许可人应清楚地了解并同意，基本价格包含机密信息；并且同意直接或间接的信息揭露是重大违约的行为。

trans-unit.source: “Calendar Year” means the year identified in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: “日历年”是指在表A中确定的年份。

trans-unit.source: “End Users” means unique individuals that license the HealthTap Software for a new, first-time, pre-paid, monthly Subscription.
trans-unit.target: “终端用户”的意思是独特的个体，这个个体授予HealthTap软件一个新的、首次使用的、预付的每月订购的许可。

trans-unit.source: “End User Group Members,” means all employees, group members, or individuals eligible to receive benefits from an End User Group, who license the HealthTap Software as authorized employees of or members of End User Groups.
trans-unit.target: “终端用户群组成员”即所有有资格从“终端用户群组”中获取利益的员工、群组成员或个体。终端用户群组给予HealthTap Software作为终端用户群组的被授权的雇员或成员的许可。

trans-unit.source: “End User Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and the End User, governing use of the HealthTap Software, the terms of which are subject to change by Licensor, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: “终端用户协议”即HealthTap和终端用户之间签订的协议，此协议规定了HealthTap Software的使用，协议的条款需服从被许可者的变更，HealthTap保留最终决定权。

trans-unit.source: “HealthTap Minimum Retained Commission” means the commission identified in Exhibit A, based on the Annual Revenue Minimum.
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap最低保留佣金”是指基于年收入最低值的附录A中确定的佣金。

trans-unit.source: “HealthTap Software” means the software identified in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap软件”是指在附录A中标识的软件。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee” means the licensee identified in the signature block to this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: “持证许可人”，即在此协议中的持证许可人部分签字的人。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Commission” means: (i) for the Pre-Purchased Subscriptions, the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap for all such Qualified Subscriptions, and (ii) for all other Qualified Subscriptions sold by Licensee via Licensee Links, the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap minus the Base Fee for such Qualified Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: “被许可人委员会”是指：(i)于已预付的订购，HealthTap将收取全部合格的产品订购的订购协议费用，(ii)对于所有其他合格的被持证许可人经由持证许可人链接卖出的产品订购，HealthTap将收取原价减去基本费用之后的款额。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Links” means URL(s) to a HealthTap-provided landing page for Licensee’s distribution of the HealthTap Software to End User Groups.
trans-unit.target: “持证许可人链接”，即一个由HealthTap提供的方便持证许可人分配HealthTap Software给终端用户群组的登陆页面。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Program” means the program identified in Exhibit A, through which the License promotes the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: “持证许可人程序”，即在附录A部分的程序，持证许可人可以通过此程序宣传HealthTap软件。

trans-unit.source: “Minimum Number” shall mean the number of Qualified Subscriptions identified in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: “最小数量”即在附录A部分的合格的产品订购的数量。

trans-unit.source: “Materials” means marketing or other public-facing materials provided by HealthTap to License for marketing of or distribution with the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: “资料”即市场营销或其他公共方面的资料，这些资料是由HealthTap提供给持证许可人使用以HealthTap Software的市场营销或分配。

trans-unit.source: “Premium Price” means the rate per Subscription, identified in Exhibit A, that End User Groups pay for Subscriptions for End User Group Member under a Subscription Agreement with HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: “会员价”，即每个在Exhibit A的产品订购的价格，这是终端客户群组根据与HealthTap签订的订购协议为终端用户群组成员支付的。
“预购订购”是指预购的年度订购。

trans-unit.source: “Qualified Subscriptions” means Subscriptions generated by Licensee through Licensee Links minus any Unqualified Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: “合格的订购”，即由持证许可人通过持证许可人链接生成并已滤去了不合格订购的订购。

trans-unit.source: “Revenue Share Distribution Fee” means the fee identified in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: “收入分配费”是指附件A中确定的费用。

trans-unit.source: “Reporting Period,” means each period, identified in Exhibit A, in which the Qualified Subscriptions generated through the Licensee Program will be calculate and for which Licensee Commissions will be paid.
trans-unit.target: “报告时期”，即每个在附录A部分的并在这个时期通过持证许可人程序生成了合格订购的时期，在这个时期持证许可人的佣金将被统计并支付给持证许可人。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription” means a new, pre-paid, non-trial, automatically renewing monthly Subscription to the HealthTap Software by a unique End User who did not previously have a Subscription to the HealthTap Software, and generated through a Subscription Agreement with an End User Group.
trans-unit.target: “订购”，即一个新的、预付的、没有试用期的、每月自动更新HealthTap软件的订购，这是一个独特的终端用户订购的，他们之前并没有购买过HealthTap软件，也没有通过一个终端用户组群订购协议产生订购。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User Group governing the license of HealthTap Software for all End User Group employees or individuals eligible to receive benefits from End User Group (all End User Group Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: “订购协议”，即HealthTap和一个终端用户群组之间的协议，此协议规定了HealthTap Software给所有终端用户组群的员工或有资格从终端用户群组获利的个体的许可，此协议的条款也要随HealthTap的变化，HealthtTap保留自行决定权。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement Fees” means fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions under Subscription Agreements with End User Groups, based on Premium Pricing.
trans-unit.target: “订购协议费用”，即由HealthTap为合格的订购收取的费用，此费用是根据与终端客户组群签订的订购协议并基于会员价收取的。

trans-unit.source: “Unqualified Subscription” means: (i) any Subscription generated by Licensee resulting in a chargeback, cancelation, fraud claim, or for which a refund is issued; or (ii) any Subscription by an End User who was previously a Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: “不合格认购”是指：(i)任何经由持证许可人产生订购若发生拒收、取消、欺诈索赔，或因为要求退款；或(ii)个曾经是订购者的终端用户的订购。

trans-unit.source: License. HealthTap hereby grants to Licensee a nonexclusive, nontransferable, license to market and and to distribute to End User Groups, the HealthTap Software and Materials, according to the terms of this Agreement. Licensee agrees to market the HealthTap Software as a benefit for all End User Group Members (and not as a “voluntary benefit”). Licensee may not sublicense the HealthTap Software to sub-distributors. Licensee may not copy, reproduce, sublicense, distribute or use the HealthTap Software or Materials, in whole or in part, other than as permitted under this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: 许可。根据此协议的条款，HealthTap因此授予一个被许可者一个非独家又不可转让的许可证，用以推销商品以及分配给终端客户组群。被许可者同意把HealthTap Software作为给所有终端客户群组成员的福利推销出去（不是志愿福利）。被许可人不得将HealthTap软件再许可给分销商。被许可者不得在此协议允许的情况下，全部或部分地复制、拷贝、许可、分配或使用HealthTap软件或资料。

trans-unit.source: Updates. HealthTap may periodically update or extend the HealthTap Software and authorize Licensee to distribute updated versions of the HealthTap Software (each an “Update”). Unless expressly permitted by Licensor in writing, at the time of any Update, Licensee shall promptly cease distribution or promotion of any prior versions of the Licensed Software.
trans-unit.target: 更新。HealthTap可以定期更新或扩展HealthTap软件，并授权被许可方分发更新版本的HealthTap软件（每个版本均为“更新”）。除非得到许可者特别的书面批准，在任何一次升级的时间内，被许可者应当立即停止分配或宣传任何老版本的已授权的软件。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Commission. Licensee is entitled to the Licensee Commissions for all Qualified Subscriptions sold under this Agreement. Within thirty (30) business days of the end of each Reporting Period, HealthTap will provide to Licensee with a Qualified Subscription Report detailing the Licensee Commission due for the Reporting Period, and shall pay any such License Commission due to Licensee. Licensee Commissions are due only after Subscription Agreement payments are received by HealthTap from the related End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 在每个报告周期的30个工作日之内，HealthTap会给被许可人提供一份详述报告期内许可佣金的合格订购报告并由于被许可人付出相应佣金。被许可佣金仅在HealthTap收到其相关的终端用户组的订购协议费用后生效。

trans-unit.source: Pricing. Licensee may set the Premium Price. The Base Price may be updated by HealthTap upon 30-days written notice to Licensee, where any such update shall apply to Subscriptions on or after the effective date of any such update; provided however that the Base Price applicable to any Subscription Agreement with a specific End User Group shall remain in effect for the term of any such Subscription Agreement, unless otherwise specified therein.
trans-unit.target: 价钱。被许可人可以设置溢价。基准价格调升时，HealthTap会提前30天发送书面通知给被许可者，任何这样的调升应在调升生效当天或之后用于所有的订购；假设基准价格适用于任何与一个特定的终端用户群组签订的订购协议，此基准价格应对任何订购协议的条款有效，除非在某一点有特别情况。

trans-unit.source: Pre-Paid Subscriptions. Licensee agrees to pre-purchase at the Base Price at least the Minimum Number of annual Qualified Subscriptions upon execution of this Agreement. The price for these Annual Subscriptions is set forth in Exhibit A. This shall entitle Licensee to sell memberships for the Licensee Commission set forth in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: 预付费用户。根据此协议，持证许可人同意以基准价格预先购买至少基本数量的合格的产品订购。这些年度订购的价格在附录A有被提到。这应授予被许可者出售会员资格以得到佣金的资格。佣金问题在附录A中有被提到。

trans-unit.source: Revenue Share Subscriptions. Licensee agrees to Licensee pay the Revenue Share Distribution Fee. The price for this fee is set forth in Exhibit A. This shall entitle Licensee to sell memberships for the Licensee Commission set forth in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: 收入共享订购。：执业执照人同意被许可人支付收入分配费。此费用的价格在附录A被提出。这应授予执业执照人出售会员资格以得到佣金的资格。佣金问题在附录A中有被提到。

trans-unit.source: Commitment. Licensee agrees to dedicate sufficient resources and efforts to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement, and shall use commercially reasonable efforts to market, promote and distribute the HealthTap Software as contemplated in this agreement, including but not limited to: (i) diligently soliciting qualified subscribers for the HealthTap Software; (ii) maintaining an adequate staff of personnel trained and qualified in the marketing of the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: 承诺。根据这份协议，被许可者同意贡献足够的资源和精力以履行它的责任，并应在商业上使用合理的方法去推销、宣传并分配HealthTap Software，在此协议中被考虑到的可能性包括并不限于：(i)努力争取更多订购HealthTap软件的用户；(ii)保持足够的受过培训并有资格推销HealthTap软件的人员。

trans-unit.source: Representations. Licensee agrees not to represent the HealthTap Software in a manner inconsistent with the most current Materials provided by HealthTap to Licensee.
trans-unit.target: 表示。被许可人同意不以与HealthTap向被许可人提供的最新材料不一致的方式表示HealthTap软件。

trans-unit.source: Goodwill. Licensee agrees to take reasonable steps to ensure that the goodwill and reputation of the HealthTap is preserved and protected and will refrain from conduct that will cast HealthTap in a negative light or otherwise damage its customer goodwill and reputation.
trans-unit.target: 信誉。被许可者同意采取合理的措施已确保HealthTap的信誉受到了保护，并避免会使HealthTap陷入负面新闻的行为或其他损害客户声誉的行为。

trans-unit.source: Notice of claims. Licensee shall notify HealthTap immediately upon notice to Licensee of any legal claim or cause of action related to the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: 声明通知。当被许可者收到任何与HealthTap软件有关的法律声明通知或诉因，被许可者应立即通知HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Confirmation. Licensee agrees not to reveal any pricing for HealthTap Software to any potential new End User Group without first confirming that such group is not a current HealthTap customer or otherwise in conversation with HealthTap to potentially license the HealthTap Software. HealthTap reserves the right to not enter into more than one Subscription Agreement with any given End User Group, and reserves the right at its sole discretion to determine which Licensee, if any, is entitled to compensation for any referrals to any End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 确认。在没有第一时间确认此群组不是HealthTap现在的客户或以其他方式与HealthTap对话以有可能地给予HealthTap软件许可的情况下，被许可者同意不得向任何潜在新终端用户群组泄露HealthTap软件的定价情况。HealthTap保留不处理多于一份与任何终端用户组群签署的订购协议的权利，并就决定哪一位被许可者——如果有的话——可因提交给任何终端用户组群而获得赔偿的问题，HealthTap保留最终决定权。

trans-unit.source: No unapproved use of name or marks. Except as provided herein, or as required by law, Licensee will not use HealthTap’s name, customers, or marks in any advertisement, news release or other public communication without the prior written consent of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 未经批准使用姓名或标记。除了在此处被提供的或是被法律要求的，被许可者不能在事先没有得到HealthTap的书面同意的情况下使用HealthTap的名字、客户或在任何广告、新闻稿或其他公共场合的通讯中使用过的商标。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term. HealthTap may terminate this agreement for convenience upon thirty (30) notice to Licensee but in the event of such termination Licesee shall retain the right to sell any Pre-Paid subscriptions under the terms of this Agreement for the applicable Calendar Year.
trans-unit.target: 条款。这份协议最初的条款应该是有效期后一年，然后除非被许可方向许可方于更新期90天前提供他意愿的书面通知，它将自动为另外一年更新。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Cause. Either party may terminate and cancel this Agreement immediately by notice to the other if: (i) the other ceases to carry on its business; or (ii) the other becomes insolvent, admits its inability to pay debts as they mature, is adjudicated bankrupts, or makes an assignment for the benefit of its creditors or other similar arrangement; or (iii) bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings are commenced by or against the other; or (iv) for a material breach, as set forth below.
trans-unit.target: 因故解除。若以下情况发生，双方的任何一方可通知另一方立即终止或取消此协议：(i)另一方终止交易活动；或(ii)另一方无力偿还债务、承认无法偿还到期债务、被宣判破产，或为其债权人制定了利益分配方案或其他类似的安排；(iii)另一方展开了破产程序；(iv)如下文提到的，发生了重大违约事件。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Material Breach. If any material breach of this Agreement by either party continues for more than thirty (30) days after breaching party’s receipt from the non-breaching party of written notice specifying the breach, the non-breaching party may terminate this Agreement by written notice, whereupon this license and all rights granted to Licensee herein shall immediately cease. Waiver by either party of any breach by the other party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any other subsequent breach. The rights of the parties under this clause are in addition to any other rights and remedies provide by law or under this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: 重大违约终止。在违约一方收到非违约一方发出的详述违约事件的书面通知后，若任何一方造成的任何重大违约事件持续超过三十（30）天，非违约一方应发出书面通知终止此协议，对此，此次许可以及所有授予被许可方的权利都应立即终止。发生违约事件后，被违约方的放弃不应被看作另一种违约。此条款中提到的各方，其权利还应加上法律或此协议授予的权利和补偿。

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder for the term including but not limited to any Annual Revenue Minimum shall become immediately due and payable. Fees due to Licensee shall be paid within sixty (60) days after termination, following a final accounting of any Licensee Commission due as of the date of Termination. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 本协议中规定的所有权，保密性，责任限制，双方关系和其他规定的条款应在本协议终止或取消后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap licenses and provides access to the HealthTap Software on an “as is” basis. HealthTap MAKES NO WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, REGARDING THE HealthTap SOFTWARE OR ITS USE AND OPERATION ALONE OR IN COMBINATION WITH THE LICENSEE PROGRAM. Neither Licensee, its employees, agents, or distributors have any right to make any other representation, warranty or promise with respect to the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap许可证并按“原样”提供对HealthTap软件的访问权限。HealthTap不做任何明示或暗示的保证，包括但不限于适销性和适用于特定用途的暗示保证，涉及HealthTap软件或其使用和操作，或与被许可人计划相结合的操作。了表示对HealthTap软件的尊重，不论被许可人、其雇员、代理人或分配者，都没有权利做出任何代表、保证和承诺。

trans-unit.source: In no event shall HealthTap be liable for special, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use, sale, or distribution of HealthTap Software by Licensee or any third party, whether under theory of contract, tort (including negligence), product liability or otherwise, even if HealthTap has been advised of the possibility of such potential loss or damage. Excluding any Licensee Commissions owed to Licensee hereunder, in no event shall HealthTap’s liability under this Agreement exceed the amount of $500.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，HealthTap均不对由被许可人或任何第三方使用，销售或分发HealthTap软件造成的特殊，偶然或继发性损害承担责任，无论是在合同理论，侵权（包括疏忽），产品责任或其他原因， 即使HealthTap已被告知这种潜在损失或损坏的可能性。除去拖欠的给被许可人的佣金，根据本协议，HealthTap在任何情况下承担的费用都不应超过500美金。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap may provide Licensee with notice and disclaimer language required in connection with Licensee’s incorporation of the HealthTap Software into the Licensee Program. Licensee agrees to incorporate any such language into the Licensee Program in connection with any offering or link to the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap可向被许可方提供与被许可方将HealthTap软件并入被许可方程序中所需的通知和免责声明。被许可人同意把这样的语言整合到被许可人程序中，这些语言与HealthTap软件的提供或网页链接有关。

trans-unit.source: Non-Exclusive License. HealthTap grants to the Licensee, throughout the Term, the non-exclusive right and license to use the common law and/or registered trademarks of HealthTap (the “Marks”) solely in connection with providing HealthTap Software to End Users. Licensee acknowledges HealthTap’s ownership of the Marks and agrees that it will not contest such ownership or the validity of the Marks. Licensee acknowledges and agrees that all use of the Marks or any intellectual property of HealthTap shall insure to the benefit of HealthTap, and Licensee agrees not to apply for any intellectual property protection of any confusingly similar mark.
trans-unit.target: 非独家许可。HealthTap在整个期限内向被许可方授予非排他性权利和许可，以便仅向与最终用户提供HealthTap软件相关的情况下使用HealthTap（“标志”）的普通法和/或注册商标。被许可人承认HealthTap对商标的所有权，并同意不会竞争商标的所有权和有效性。许可人知道并同意，所有HealthTap的商标和知识产权的使用都应确保HealthTap的利益，被许可人还应同意，不得为任何可能会引起混淆的显示的商标申请知识产权保护。

trans-unit.source: Neither Party, except as required by law or court or arbitrator of competent jurisdiction, shall divulge, furnish or make available to any third party, or without the other Party’s prior written consent any confidential or proprietary information of or concerning the other party (“Confidential Information”) or use the Confidential Information except in connection with performance of its obligations under this Agreement. Confidential Information includes methods of operation and organization, business plans, expansion plans, pricing schedules, lead generation information and data, and specific information that is designated by a party as confidential or proprietary. LICENSEE EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT BASE PRICING IS STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. Confidential information does not include information that (i) is already public knowledge or has become a part of the public domain through no breach of this Agreement; (ii) a party develops without any use of or reference to the other party’s information; or (iii) a party subsequently acquires by lawful means from a third party without any obligation of confidentiality to that third party.

trans-unit.source: By dividing apps into 30 separate categories, AppRx and the HealthTap Annual AppRx Report help users make sense of the vast landscape of health and wellness apps. The independent reviews provided by doctors on HealthTap help both patients and peer doctors learn which apps are medically sound, useful in supporting health or wellness goals, and easy to learn and use. The ratings reveal some surprising recommendations for best apps that might otherwise be missed.
trans-unit.target: 通过将应用程序分为30个不同的类别，App医生评测和HealthTap年度App医生评测报告帮助用户了解健康应用程序的广阔景观。HealthTap上医生提供的独立评价帮助患者和同行医生了解哪些应用程序在医学上是健全的，有助于支持健康或健康目标，以及易于学习和使用。对于那些容易被忽视的最好的应用程序，评分显示了令人惊讶的意见。

trans-unit.target: a.公司应向关联公司提供定向到公司网站和/或移动应用程序（“公司应用程序”）上的特定目标网页（“关联企业目标网页”）的自定义关联企业链接。关联公司同意，只有直接从此关联企业链接生成的客户注册，关联企业才有权获得进一步阐述的赔偿。

trans-unit.source: c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur. Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”). Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate. If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.
trans-unit.target: c.购买者持有的佣金的两个月期间，保护公司可能发生的任何退款。公司应在扣除期后（“佣金支付日”）后，每个月第一天之后的十五天内支付应付给联盟的所有佣金。公司可以把佣金付款给关联公司，扣留委员会付款以及通过会员链接（“会员退款费”）注册交易产生的实际退款费。如果由于联盟退款费用，联盟佣金付款余额为负值，公司可以暂停或终止联盟链接，或联盟伙伴参与联盟计划。

trans-unit.source: d. If on any Commission Payment Date, the amount of total Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate is less than $25.00, then such accrued and payable balance shall be held over to the following month, and paid together with the Commissions due for that month. If at any time, the balance of accrued and payable Commissions is held over for 2 consecutive months, then Company shall pay all accrued and payable Commissions to Affiliate in the third month, regardless of the total amount owed. Payment is made via the Affiliate PayPal account or other account permitted by Company. Affiliate is responsible for any payment processing or PayPal fees associated with delivery and receipt of payment and understands and agrees that payments received will be reduced by any such fees..
trans-unit.target: d.如果在佣金支付日期时，支付给关联公司的佣金总额小于25.00美元，那么应计和应付的余额应持续到下个月，并与该月到期的佣金一起支付。无论任何时候，应计和应付佣金的余额持续2个月，则公司应在第三个月支付所有应计和应付佣金给关联公司，不论欠款总额。通过联盟PayPal帐户或公司允许的其他帐户进行付款。联盟负责与交付和收到付款相关的付款处理或PayPal费用，并理解和同意收到的付款将通过此类费用减少。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime provides primary care virtual consults with doctors licensed in your state for limited diagnosis, care and prescriptions (as appropriate). HealthTap Concierge lets you connect with your doctor for viritual consults using the HelathTap platform, or with other doctors for second opinions or one-time consults for minor conditions that can be addressed and resolved, in the sole opinion of the doctor, via a virtual consult. HealthTap Premium Services can be a great resource between doctor visits, but are not a substitute for in person doctor visits, your primary care doctor or your primary care doctor’s independent judgment about any symptom, condition, or the appropriateness or risks of a procedure or treatment for a given person. HealthTap Prime is not health insurance and is not a substitute for health insurance.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime提供初级保健在线医生咨询,许可在你的国家进行有限的诊断，治疗和处方（如被适用）。HealthTap管家帐号可以让你与你的医生使用helathtap平台进行在线咨询，或提供其他医生的第二意见或通过在线咨询以医生的独家观点,在处理和解决次要条件后,进行一次性咨询。HealthTap优质服务是一个巨大的医生咨询资源，但不能代替私人的医生的建议，不能代替你的初级保健医生或你的初级保健医生对于任何症状，情况的独立判断，还有对于适用性,一个手术风险或特定患者治疗的独立判断。HealthTap Prime不是健康保险而且不能替代健康保险。

trans-unit.source: Scholars are highly experienced and accomplished doctors who have earned the privilege of curating the most trusted health information on the world’s largest Interactive and Mobile Health Platform. HealthTap is the world’s leading digital healthcare service, providing patients free access to tens of thousands of the best U.S. licensed doctors through the web or any mobile device. As a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, I’m able help millions around the world with their health and well-being by answering questions, offering tips, and creating checklists for healthy living.

trans-unit.source: “Annual Revenue Minimums” means revenue received by HealthTap (less any applicable Licensee Commission) equivalent to the value of the Minimum Number of Qualified Subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User Group governing the license of HealthTap Software for all End User Group employees or group members eligible to receive benefits from End User Group (all End User Group Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.

trans-unit.source: Licensee Commission. Licensee is entitled to the Licensee Commission for all Qualified Subscriptions sold under this Agreement. Within thirty (30) business days of the end of each Reporting Period, HealthTap will provide to Licensee with a Qualified Subscription Report detailing the Licensee Commission due for the Reporting Period, and shall pay any such License Commission due to Licensee. Licensee Commissions are due only after Subscription Agreement payments are received by HealthTap from the related End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 被许可人有权收取这项协议下的所有合格订购出售得来的被许可佣金。在每个报告周期的30个工作日之内，HealthTap会给被许可人提供一份详述报告期内许可佣金的合格订购报告并由于被许可人付出相应佣金。被许可佣金仅在HealthTap收到其相关的终端用户组的订购协议费用后生效。

trans-unit.source: Annual Revenue Minimum. To participate as a Licensee and distributor of the HealthTap Software, Licensee agrees that on or before the Licensee Minimum Date, Licensee shall meet the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. In the event that HealthTap has not received Annual Revenue Minimums from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions before the Licensee Minimum Date, HealthTap may immediately collect from Licensee, including using payment information provided by Licensee at sign up, the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any, less any Qualified Agreement Subscription Fees collected and retained by HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 如果有参与HealthTap的软件许可和分销商，被许可方同意在最小的许可日期或之前，被许可方应满足最低年收入。如果HealthTap在最小许可日前未收到来自被许可合格订购的最小年收入，HealthTap会立即从被许可人出收费，包括使用被许可人在注册时提供的付费信息，最小年收入将由留存在HealthTap的已收集的合格订购协议费用中扣除。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Minimum Date Payments. On the Effective Date, Licensee shall provide payment information to Licensor for the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. Where any Annual Revenue Minimum exists, such minimum shall not be charged to Licensee if the Licensee generates the Annual Revenue Minimum from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions under this Agreement each year on or before the Licensee Minimum Date.
trans-unit.target: 在有效期内，被许可方应向许可方提供年度最低收入的付款信息。假使任何最低年收入存在，如果在协议下最低被许可日当天或之前被许可人从被许可合格订购中获得了最低年收入，这样的最低收入不能由被许可人负责。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term.

trans-unit.source: Termination for Convenience. HealthTap may terminate this Agreement for convenience on thirty (30) days notice to Licensee. Such termination shall impact only the Licensee’s ability to sell additional future Subscriptions and the terms under which any pre-purchased or previously sold subscriptions shall remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 为了方便，HealthTap可以在通知被许可方后三十（30）天终止本协议。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订购的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订购的条款保持不变。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订购的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订购的条款保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 如果本协议终止，授予被许可人的权利和许可应立即终止，被许可人停止在市场上营销，分发或售卖HealthTap软件; 如果被许可方在上述任何期限结束前终止本协议，任何费用都根据本协议收取。本协议中规定的所有权，保密性，责任限制，双方关系和其他规定的条款应在本协议终止或取消后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will see patients who are physically located in a state in which you are licensed. However, HealthTap is a global service that helps millions worldwide. Given the demand around the world for access to top doctors such as yourself, you may be asked to take international consults occasionally. These may be from U.S. citizens who are traveling or living overseas, or from English-speaking foreign citizens who wish to ask advice of American-trained doctors. You should take these calls no matter what state you practice in. You should treat the patient just as you would if he or she were calling from within the United States, including recommending the appropriate prescription in your SOAP note.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您将看到位于您获得许可的州内的患者。考虑到世界各地对诸如您自己对顶级医生的需求，您可能会被要求不定期接受国际咨询。这些人可能来自旅行或居住在海外的美国公民，或来自想要询问受过美国训练的医生的那些说英语的外国公民。您应该接这些电话，无论您在什么练习状态。您应该像对待来自美国的人一样对待所有病人，包括在您的SOAP注释中推荐适当的处方。

trans-unit.source: Just as you do in the real world, bring your wonderful bedside manner to your Virtual Consults!
trans-unit.target: 就像您在现实世界中一样，把您对待临床的方式带到您的在线领域！

trans-unit.source: The patient will trust in your experience, expertise, and skills. In return, you should trust that your patient is being honest and straightforward.
trans-unit.target: 患者将信任您的经验，专业知识和技能。作为回报，您应该相信您的病人是诚实和直接的。

trans-unit.source: You should respect the patient as a unique, real person, and the patient will reciprocate by respecting your years of clinical experience and knowledge—and that you are a human being, too.
trans-unit.target: 您应该尊重患者并把他们看作是一个独特的，真实的人，患者将通过尊重您的多年的临床经验和知识作为回报 - 并且您也是一个人。

trans-unit.source: You’ll be ready to begin the consult without making the patient wait.
trans-unit.target: 您会准备好开始咨询，不让患者等待。

trans-unit.source: Through your years of practice experience, you’ll know the relevant questions to ask the patient. Expect frequently the patient will have prepared for the consult using HealthTap, and will ask very informed questions.
trans-unit.target: 通过您多年的诊疗经验，您会知道要问病人哪些相关的问题。期望患者将经常使用HealthTap来为咨询做准备，并会提出非常不正式的问题。

trans-unit.source: The patient should be able to easily understand what you say.
trans-unit.target: 患者应该能够很容易地理解您说的。

trans-unit.source: Most patients will expect to collaborate with you in the creation of their care plan. Encourage this, as it will increase their buy-in.
trans-unit.target: 大多数患者会期望与您合作共同创建他们的护理计划。

trans-unit.source: The patient will expect empathy from you in a relationship that is warm yet stays in the professional realm.
trans-unit.target: 病人会期望您的共鸣，与您保持一个温暖的关系，并且留在专业领域。

trans-unit.source: A personal connection with appropriate boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 适当范围内的个人关系。

trans-unit.source: To prepare for Virtual Consults on your

(0.25Mbps or better). We strongly advise against taking video calls on 2G, 3G, or other mobile data connections. They tend to lack sufficient bandwidth to stream videos in high quality. Mobile 4G and LTE connections are often sufficient, but these video consults will use data that count towards your monthly data plan.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议您不要在2G，3G或其他移动数据连接上接听视频通话。移动4G和LTE连接通常是足够的，但这些视频咨询将使用计入您的每月数据计划的数据。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are connected to a strong, reliable, high-speed wifi network
trans-unit.target: 确保您连接到一个强大，可靠，高速的无线网络

trans-unit.source: Just like in your real practice, the presentation of your office can create a strong sense of professionalism and trustworthiness for your patients. Try to do the same with any environment that you choose for your Virtual Consults.
trans-unit.target: 就像在您的实际做法中一样，您办公室的展示可以为您的患者创造一种强烈的专业精神和可信赖的感觉。尝试在任何环境下对您为在线咨询功能执行相同操作。

trans-unit.source: Here’s what you’ll earn by conducting Virtual Consults:
trans-unit.target: 以下是您通过执行在线咨询获得的收益：

trans-unit.source: You can choose whichever shifts fit into your schedule.
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择适合您日程安排的班次。

trans-unit.source: You can make a request for time off more than one week in advance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提前一周以上提出要求。

trans-unit.source: These changes are made less than one week in advance. Changes on short notice are excusable only for real personal and professional emergencies. Requests to change shifts without an acceptable excuse may result in your loss of privileges as a HealthTap Prime doctor.
trans-unit.target: 短期通知的变更仅适用于真正的个人和专业紧急情况。没有可接受的理由而要求换班可能导致您失去作为HealthTap Prime医生的特权。

trans-unit.source: Patients love the human connection and want your personality to shine through. Studies show that a smile will not only help put your patients at ease, but will make them more receptive to your advice and be more satisfied overall! And as always, treat patients as you would wish to be treated--with kindness, patience, and care. We want to create a delightful doctor-patient experience during each and every Virtual Consult.*
trans-unit.target: 研究表明，微笑不仅会帮助您的病人放松，更会使他们容易接受您的建议，并增加整体的满意度！和往常一样，要像您希望被治疗一样去治疗患者-用与善良，耐心和关怀。我们希望在每个在线咨询期间能够创造令人愉快的医生与患者的体验。*

trans-unit.source: from the camera and type notes, and that this is normal and expected. “Jane, during our consult, I may look away from the screen to type notes during our conversation. I hope that’s okay.”*
trans-unit.target: 从相机和笔记类型，这是正常的和预期的。“Jane，在我们的咨询期间，我可能会看着远离屏幕，在我们的谈话期间键入笔记。

trans-unit.source: Allow for a pause after the patient finishes speaking to account for any lag in the video transmission.*
trans-unit.target: 在患者完成说话之后允许暂停，以解决视频传输中的任何滞后问题。*

trans-unit.source: from being on video, you can offer them to turn off their video camera and conduct the consult over voice-only.*
trans-unit.target: 从视频，您可以让他们关闭他们的摄像机，仅通过语音进行咨询。

trans-unit.source: any diagnosis or assessment to the patient.
trans-unit.target: 对患者的任何诊断或评估。

trans-unit.source: for all patients, providing general care. For issues outside your speciality, you may refer the patient to see a specialist in your SOAP note.
trans-unit.target: 对于您的专业以外的问题，您可以参考患者在SOAP注释中查看专家。

trans-unit.source: (subjective, objective, assessment, plan) report immediately following the consult. Always include instructions for further care in person with a doctor if symptoms persist.
trans-unit.target: （主观，客观，评估，计划）报告后立即进行咨询。如果症状持续存在，一定要当面与医生沟通，获取对未来护理的指示。

trans-unit.source: to ensure that patients requesting consults minutes before shift ends are still helped. Please try not to rush consults even if they extend beyond a few minutes over the end of your shift.
trans-unit.target: 以确保在轮班结束之前请求咨询的患者仍然得到帮助。请尽量不要急于咨询，即使他们在您的轮班结束时延长超过几分钟。

such as erectile dysfunction or diet drugs

trans-unit.target: 如果您在咨询期间收到电话，则应将其直接发送到语音信箱

trans-unit.source: Even if you determine that a patient needs an x-ray, that information is incredibly useful to the patient.

trans-unit.source: To start your shift, log onto HealthTap (desktop or laptop) with your browser open and / or have the HealthTap For Doctors app installed on your iPhone, iPad, or Android smartphone, or Android tablet device and click “Start Shift” in the app. This will check you in to your shift.
trans-unit.target: 要开始换班，请在打开浏览器的情况下登录HealthTap（台式机或笔记本电脑），并在iPhone，iPad或Android智能手机或Android平板电脑上安装HealthTap For Doctors应用程序，然后点击应用程序中的“开始班次”

trans-unit.source: Between Live Consults, you are responsible for responding to all Inbox Consults that appear in your queue on a first-come, first-served basis.
trans-unit.target: 在众多在线咨询里，您有责任以先来先服务的方式响应队列中显示的所有收件箱结果。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap believes in providing only the highest levels of quality care by only the best doctors. If you have no Live Consults or Inbox Consults pending, you are responsible for helping us conduct peer review on the SOAP notes of your colleagues to provide an evaluation of others’ documentation for the purpose of quality assurance. For each consult peer review request, you will be asked to answer the following multiple choice question and to briefly explain your responses:

trans-unit.source: These decisions and choices are yours, and we believe that you, in connection with the advice you receive from your doctor or other professional healthcare provider, are the best decision maker about your health. You should always use common sense when making health decisions, and they should be made in consultation with your doctor. HealthTap cannot make decisions for you. What we can do is help you find good health information and connect with doctors for in-person care. On HealthTap you can ask and find informational questions and related educational answers and tips by Medical Experts. HealthTap is not a place for the practice of medicine, but Medical Experts on HealthTap can be a resource for reliable, relevant general health information. We hope these services will be of value to you. Please use them responsibly.
trans-unit.target: 在做出健康判断时，您应该总是使用常识，并且应该咨询您的医生。我们可以做的是帮助您找到良好的健康信息，并与医生联系以当面关怀。在HealthTap上，您可以询问并找到信息性问题以及相关医疗专家的的教育性的答案和提示。HealthTap不是医疗诊疗的地方，但HealthTap的医疗专家可以作为可靠，相关的一般健康信息的资源。我们希望这些服务对您有价值。请负责任地使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Accurate and complete registration information is required to use HealthTap. All members are encouraged to use password common sense: safeguard your log in password, pick a password that cannot be guessed by others, keep it private, and periodically change it. You are responsible for the security of your passwords and for any use of your account. Please immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your password or account. As a part of registration you will create a profile with a Public Profile Name. Like your password, if you wish to remain anonymous, use common sense: safeguard your Public Profile Name, pick a name that cannot be guessed by others, and keep it private. Do not use your real name, or the real name of any one related to you when selecting your Public Profile Name. Allowing any other person or entity to use your identity for posting on or using HealthTap is not permitted. Do not include your real name or any other information that could be used to identify you in anything you post on HealthTap, including questions, comments, or other submissions.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a service for individuals to use to support their personal health decisions. You may use HealthTap for personal, but not for commercial, purposes. We authorize you to view or download the Content and use the Services solely for your personal, noncommercial use in accordance with all applicable federal, state and local laws. The Content is licensed only for the personal, household, and educational use of a single individual. An individual's noncommercial reuse or redistribution of any portion of the Content is permitted when that use falls within what is permitted by United States Copyright law or the Lanham Act. These laws govern general personal use of copyrighted information. No commercial use or redistribution of any Content is permitted. Any hyperlink or other re-display of the information on another website must display the Content full-screen and not within a "frame" on the linked or other site, unless expressly pre-approved and permitted by us in writing. By using HealthTap, you agree not use any contact information provided by members (for example, in a private message exchange between connected members), or harvest, scrape or otherwise collect any information about our members for any reason, including but not limited to for sending unsolicited communications, including spam.

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend or endorse any specific Content, Services, tests, doctors, products, procedures, opinions, or other information that may be mentioned on HealthTap. We hope that our Content and Services will be useful, but we cannot guarantee that the Content and Services will help you achieve any specific goals or results. Content regarding dietary supplements or other treatments or regimens has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
trans-unit.target: 我们不推荐和认可一些特殊的内容、服务、测试、医生、产品、临床操作、意见和其他可能在HealthTap中提到的信息。HealthTap旨在与常识一起运用，并与您的医生或您的其他医疗保健提供者的建议联系起来。依赖HealthTap的内容或服务完全由您自己承担风险。一些内容和服务，包括医学专家的帖子，可能或已经是第三方直接提供的，我们希望我们的内容和服务会很有用，但我们不能保证内容和服务能够帮助您实现任何特定目标或结果。关于膳食补充剂或其他治疗方案的内容尚未由食品和药物管理局评估，并且不旨在诊断、治疗、治愈或预防任何疾病。

trans-unit.target: 如果您违反本协议中的条款，您使用内容和服务的权限将立即结束。我们可能在任何时候对修改进行限制或终止您访问和使用HealthTap和其服务与内容的权利。此类暂停或终止可能会删除信息、文件以及其他先前可用的内容。

trans-unit.source: When we make changes, we will revise the "last modified" date at the top of this document. We encourage you to review these terms of service periodically. Your continued use of HealthTap constitutes your agreement to the changed terms of service.
trans-unit.target: 当我们作出改变的时候，我们将修订本文档顶部的“上次修改”日期。我们鼓励您定期查看这些服务条款。您继续使用HealthTap即表示您同意更改的服务条款。

trans-unit.source: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless against any claims or losses imposed on, incurred by, or asserted as a result of or relating to: (a) your use of HealthTap or the Content or Services; (b) your noncompliance with any of the terms and conditions hereof; and (c) any third-party actions related to or arising from your receipt or use of HealthTap or the Content or Services, whether authorized or unauthorized under the Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: 您同意赔偿并保护我们免于因以下原因而造成或声称的任何索赔或损失：（a）您使用HealthTap或内容或服务; （b）您违反本协议的任何条款和条件; （c）与您接收或使用HealthTap或内容或服务相关的任何第三方行为，无论该使用条款是否授权。

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Site and the Content are provided on as "as is" basis. NEITHER WE, HEALTHTAP MEDICAL EXPERTS, NOR ANY OF OUR LICENSORS MAY BE HELD LIABLE UNDER THIS AGREEMENT FOR ANY DAMAGES OTHER THAN DIRECT DAMAGES, EVEN IF THE PARTY KNOWS OR SHOULD KNOW THAT OTHER DAMAGES ARE POSSIBLE, OR THAT DIRECT DAMAGES ARE NOT A SATISFACTORY REMEDY. THE LIMITATIONS IN THIS SECTION APPLY TO YOU ONLY TO THE EXTENT THEY ARE LAWFUL IN YOUR JURISDICTION. WE DISCLSIAM ALL WARRANTIES, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTIES' RIGHTS, AND FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Specifically, and without limiting the foregoing, We, our licensors, and our suppliers, make no representations or warranties about:
trans-unit.target: 根据本协议，对于任何直接损害以外的任何损害，即使本公司知道或应当知道其他损害可能发生，或者直接损害不是满意的救济，我们，健康卡医疗专家或任何我们的许可证发行人均不承担责任。本部分的限制仅适用于您所在司法辖区内适用的范围。我们不提供任何明示或暗示，法定或其他方面的担保，包括但不限于适销性，非侵权第三方权利和特定用途适用性的默示担保。具体而言，在不限制前述内容的情况下，我们及我们的许可人和我们的供应商对以下内容不作任何声明或保证：

trans-unit.source: The use of HealthTap and the Content and Services is at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap的内容和服务的风险由您自行承担。

trans-unit.source: Content on the site created, submitted or validated by Medical Experts or other healthcare experts on HealthTap (collectively, "Expert Content") are subject to the following additional terms and conditions. (When we use the term Content elsewhere in this TOU, this term includes Expert Content.) The authors or third party posting such content ("Posters") are solely responsible for their content. While we hope that you will find the Expert Content informative and educational, neither we nor the Poster make any representations or warranties with respect to any information offered or provided within or through the Expert Content regarding treatment of medical conditions, action, or application of medication. Posters are solely responsible for their content. Under no circumstances, as a result of your use of the Expert Content or this Site, will the Expert Content Poster or such Poster's employer or sponsor be liable to you or to any other person for any damages or harm–including any direct, indirect, special, incidental, exemplary, consequential or other damages under any legal theory, including, without limitation, tort, contract, strict liability or otherwise, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, the Poster (and such Poster's employer and/or sponsor) shall have absolutely no liability in connection with HealthTap for: (a) any loss or injury caused, in whole or in part, by the Poster's actions, omissions, or negligence, in procuring, compiling, or delivering information within or through Expert Content; (b) any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in such information regardless of how caused, or delays or interruptions in delivery of such information; or (c) any decision made or action taken or not taken in reliance upon such information. This means you should not rely on the Expert Content or make medical or other important decisions based on it, and it also means that the Posters are not responsible for what you do or don't do with the Content. For medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis, see your personal doctor or expert healthcare provider. You agree to indemnify and hold the Poster (and the Poster's employer and/or sponsor) harmless from any claim or demand, including attorneys' fees, made by any third party as a result of (1) any content posted or made available by you through Expert Content, (2) any violation of law that occurs by you through your use of Expert Content or this Site, and/or (3) anything you do using Expert Content, this Site and/or the information contained therein.
trans-unit.target: 由医疗专家或其他健康专家在HealthTap上所创建，提交或验证的网站上的内容（统称为“专家内容”）需遵守以下附加条款和条件。（当我们使用术语“内容”时，这一术语即专家内容。）作者或发布此类内容的第三方（“海报”）对其内容负全部责任。虽然我们希望您觉得专业内容的很有帮助，但我们和海报对于在专家内容所提供的任何关于医疗条件，行动或应用药物的信息的不做出任何声明或保证 。在不限制以上所述的一般性的情况下，海报（以及此类海报的雇主和／或供应商）对HealthTap没有任何责任：（a）全部或部分由海报的行为、疏漏、疏忽，在采购、编辑或提供信息期间或通过专家内容所造成的损失或损害；（b）不管由什么所引起的此类信息的错误、疏漏或不精确，或传递信息的推迟及间断；（c）依赖于此类信息的任何决定的形成或行动的采取或不采取。这意味着您不应该依赖于专家内容以及在此基础上做重要的医学或其他方面的决定，这同时意味着海报对于您对内容做的或不做的不负责任。对于医疗建议、治疗或诊断，请咨询您的私人医生或专业医务人员。您同意赔偿并保持海报（以及海报的雇主和／或供应商）免于由任何第三方作出的索赔或要求，包括律师费，因为（1）您通过专家内容发布或提供的任何内容，（2）您使用专家内容或这一网站所违反的法律，（3）您使用专家内容、应用程序及其包含的信息所做的一切。

trans-unit.source: The licenses for some of this Content may contain additional terms. When such Content licenses contain additional terms, we will make these terms available to you on those pages, in the Terms of Use or in the Additional Information section of our Site (which is incorporated herein by reference).
trans-unit.target: 部分此内容的许可可能包含附加条款。当这些内容许可中包含附加条款时，我们将在这些页面，使用条款或本网站的其他信息部分（通过引用将其并入本文）中向您提供这些条款。

means a direct access method, such as through a HyperText Transfer Protocol ("HTTP") that is provided by NUANCE and is used by LICENSEE to access the Service from the LICENSEE Product.
